Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Joey's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Joey somehow came into contact with a group named "the Saviors" which he subsequently joined. Joey aided his group in terrorizing other survivors and communities around the area into subjugating to Negan's will, where their victims would be forced to give half their supplies in exchange for not being murdered. Joey is outside with Yago 's group when he is told to search Carol Peletier to see if she has any melee weapons. This causes him to be captured by Carol and he begs Yago and the others not to shoot him. Yago doesn't follow his pleas and both Yago and his squad of Saviors shoot Joey in an attempt to kill Carol.
Death[]: Killed By Carol Peletier (Caused) Yago (Caused and Direct) The Saviors After being captured by Carol, Joey begs his comrades not to shoot but Yago ignores his pleas and ends up shooting Joey to death alongside his men in an attempt to kill Carol, who escapes. His body is likely devoured by the walkers that are let inside the compound.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Joey has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies and unnamed people
Trivia[]: Joey is credited as Key Ring Savior in " Some Guy ". This Savior is nicknamed Skinny Joey , as referred to by Negan in " Rock in the Road ".
Name: Joey
